i bought this watch for my brother. this watch looks even more good in real than the given picture. men of any age can use it and it is also a very good gifting option. also, it can be worn with any kind of outfit and to any event. flipkart service is also good and secure. thanks flipkart.

This is an awesome watch.. Worth buying this coz it looks like 2k rupees worth watch.. If your wrist is thin need not think.. just go for it & Need not say any thing about flipkart service.. I got the watch in 3 days.. every time they call and come but this time surprise visit made me :)..

Got it for a gift. Good looks, inexpensive. A watch which can be worn with casuals and as well office formals. The orange specks in the hands gives it a distinctive look. Though the dial looks small in the pic it is not, it did match my expectations.
Good purchase, if you are looking for something in budget with good looks. Go for it. It tells the time.... need more, pay more.

A good product, worth the price. The only issue is the minute and second hands sometimes gets lost in the background in low light. Also for the first time I am disappointed with flipkart delivery. It seemed like they have sent me a product which was returned se it looked like some of the packings on watch were already tampered. Though the watch was brand new but still this is not what flipkart is supposed to do. They must deliver brand new product from factory.
